item.description:
Meet us at the Ashland Resevoir boat-landing on Spring Street in Hopkinton, MA!

This is a gorgeous, 'round the lake adventure that can be done in 55 minutes (according to one member...) or 4 hours (if your dog loves to stop and swim!) Dogs can be off leash (as long as they are under owner control and non-aggressive), and the scenery is great for viewing, pictures, enjoying the nice weather!

Please bring your friends and your friendly dog to enjoy this fantastic trail... If you've never done it, you'll love it forever; if you have, you know what I mean :)

Don't forget shoes (that don't matter too much... as long as they can get messy!) and poop bags, as this park is carry-in, carry-out (we HAVE to be responsible :)

Really look forward to seeing as many as possible of you there!

Email justcassie101@comcast.net with questions, concerns, comments or suggestions!

Punish the Deed, Not the Breed.
item.how_to_find_us: NEBBC Attire, and ALL THE BULLY BREEDS! :)
item.name: Off- or On-Leash Meet-Up at the Ashland Resevoir!
